query:
ALTER TABLE decisions 
ADD COLUMN decidedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN decidedBy VARCHAR(256) NULL,
ADD COLUMN justification TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionRef VARCHAR(64) NULL;
